https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV._instruction: Add the coordinate point identifying the best view of this atlas annotation in space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.description: Coordinate point from which you get the best view of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.label: Best view point
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/bestV.name: bestViewPoint

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.label: Criteria
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.name: criteria

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.label: Criteria quality type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.name: criteriaQualityType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (HEX) for this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.label: Display color
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.name: displayColor

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi._instruction: Add one or several (source) files that inspired the definition of this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi.label: Inspired by
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inspi.name: inspiredBy

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this atlas annotation is defined in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.label: Laterality
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/later.name: laterality

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this atlas annotation that may help you to more easily find it again.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this atlas annotation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua._instruction: Add the (source) image file in which this atlas annotation is visualized in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.description: Reference to an image in which something is visible.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.label: Visualized in
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/visua.name: visualizedIn
